sentence.Network_en: The use of ungranted patent applications or terminated, nullified or invalid patents to advertise is prohibited.
sentence.Network_cn: 禁止使用未授予专利权的专利申请和已经终止 、 撤销、无效的专利做广告.

baesInfo.translate_result: engrafted灌输，使牢记，嫁接( engraft的过去式和过去分词 )
